committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development

official_title: To redesignate a Federal building in Suitland, Maryland, as the "W. Edwards Deming Federal Building".

summary.text: Redesignates Federal Office Building No. 3 located in the Suitland Federal Center at 4700 Silver Hill Road in Suitland, Maryland, as the W. Edwards Deming Federal Building.

titles.title: To redesignate a Federal building in Suitland, Maryland, as the "W. Edwards Deming Federal Building".
